transArray.content: The lady at the front desk has an excellent service attitude and is very considerate ❤️. People are also beautiful. The location of the hotel is very good, just at Qianmen Square, just outside the subway entrance. Very close to Tiananmen Square. Could you please send me a WeChat message, thank you. It's the second order, so I won't give a really bad review. ps I still have several orders
